name: Light Brite
description:
Inspired by the LITE BRITE toy, this game is about growing a design using lightbulbs. Share screenshots of your design in the comments.

  • Buy lightbulbs
  • Power lightbulbs
    • Make sure you power the squares to make them grow
    • Orange power makes bulbs grow faster
  • Harvest Bulbs
    • Unselect power and click lightbulbs
  • Buy plots
    • Buy more plots and power them to build a bigger grid
